verses.verse: Now in the first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia, <S%H6539><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> by the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> might be accomplished, <S%H3615><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> stirred up <S%H5782><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia, <S%H6539><s%> so that he made a proclamation <S%H5674><s%> throughout all his kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and put it also in writing, <S%H4385><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Thus says <S%H559><s%> Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia, <S%H6539><s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh, the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> me all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> and he has commanded <S%H6485><s%> me to build <S%H1129><s%> him a house <S%H1004><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> which is in Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

Whoever there is among you of all his people, <S%H5971><s%> may his God <S%H430><s%> be with him, <S%H5927><s%> and let him go up to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> which is in Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> (he is God <S%H430><s%>), which is in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Whoever is left, <S%H7604><s%> in any place <S%H4725><s%> where he lives, <S%H1481><s%> let the men <S%H582><s%> of his place <S%H4725><s%> help <S%H5375><s%> him with silver, <S%H3701><s%> with gold, <S%H2091><s%> with goods, <S%H7399><s%> and with animals, <S%H929><s%> besides the freewill offering <S%H5071><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> which is in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>'"

Then the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' households of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> and the priests, <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> even all whose spirit <S%H7307><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had stirred <S%H5782><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> rose up <S%H5927><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> which is in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

All those who were around <S%H5439><s%> them strengthened <S%H2388><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> with vessels <S%H3627><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> with gold, <S%H2091><s%> with goods, <S%H7399><s%> and with animals, <S%H929><s%> and with precious things, <S%H4030><s%> besides all that was willingly offered. <S%H5068><s%>

Also Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> brought forth <S%H3318><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> which Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> had brought out <S%H3318><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and had put <S%H5414><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his gods; <S%H430><s%>

even those, <S%H3566><s%> Cyrus king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> brought out <S%H3318><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Mithredath <S%H4990><s%> the treasurer, <S%H1489><s%> and numbered <S%H5608><s%> them to Sheshbazzar, <S%H8339><s%> the prince <S%H5387><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

This is the number <S%H4557><s%> of them: <S%H7970><s%> thirty platters <S%H105><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> one thousand <S%H505><s%> platters <S%H105><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> - nine <S%H8672><s%> knives, <S%H4252><s%>

thirty <S%H7970><s%> bowls <S%H3713><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> bowls <S%H3713><s%> of a second <S%H4932><s%> sort four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten, <S%H6235><s%> and other <S%H312><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> one thousand. <S%H505><s%>

All the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> and of silver <S%H3701><s%> were five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%> Sheshbazzar <S%H8339><s%> brought all these up, <S%H5927><s%> when the captives <S%H1473><s%> were brought up <S%H5927><s%> from Babylon <S%H894><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
